- Title: "Real-time Refraction Demo: Mosquito in Amber"
- Generator: "Sketchfab-7.51.0, hand-edited to add additional PBR glTF extensions."
description: glTF 3D model of a "Mosquito In Amber" using the IOR, [KHR-materials-transmission](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/blob/master/extensions/2.0/Khronos/KHR_materials_transmission/README.md) and Volume PBR extensions to add reflection and refraction to translucent materials.
name: Mosquito In Amber
summary: glTF 3D model of a "Mosquito In Amber" using the IOR, [KHR-materials-transmission](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/blob/master/extensions/2.0/Khronos/KHR_materials_transmission/README.md) and Volume PBR extensions to add reflection and refraction to translucent materials.
